text: Marian Alexandru (born 20 September 1977 in Bucharest) is a Romanian former football player. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Steaua București players Category:FCM Târgoviște players Category:FC Olimpia Satu Mare players Category:ACF Gloria Bistrița players Category:ASC Oțelul Galați players Category:FC Petrolul Ploiești players Category:FC Vaslui players Category:CSM Ceahlăul Piatra Neamț players Category:CS Concordia Chiajna players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Spartak Vladikavkaz players Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Russia Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia
title: Marian Alexandru
